entry.title: DataSig -- Data signatures over Lightning
entry.summary: The provided context consists of three parts, two of which are non-text attachments. The first attachment is an HTML file that has been scrubbed and no information about its content is available. The second attachment is a public key in ASC format belonging to Asteria at Valera.sh and is 713 bytes in size. The third attachment is a digital signature in ASC format that is 249 bytes in size and uses OpenPGP encryption.
